'''''Up by the Roots''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to follow and defeat the [[Whopperflower]] after the Commission [[When Flowers Bloom (Commission)|When Flowers Bloom]]. The Whopperflower flees Northeast across the river and attacks the player once they catch up to it.
